channel.title: Infinate prayer?
channel.description: Hey guys, i need a command that gives the user infinate prayer, i get really sick of my prayer droping and people getting divine spirit shields and ags for killing me >.< i can make it for just me on my own, i just need the command. thanks in advance!

item.title: Infinate prayer?
item.dc:creator: @nickenator nickenator
item.description:
@nickenator wrote:

eh i figured it out, heres the code i came up with:if (cmd[0].equalsIgnoreCase("infpray") && p.username.equalsIgnoreCase("Not gonna say my ingame name :o")) { p.skillLvl[5] = 999999; p.getActionSender().setSkillLvl(p, 5); }

Read full topic

item.title: Infinate prayer?
item.dc:creator: @hippo429 hippo429
item.description:
@hippo429 wrote:

idk what you would do for a command but you could make a ring with 9999999999 prayer bonus
